title: Job Vacancies at  Avocado Virtual Solutions
content:
Avocado Virtual Solutions (AVS) is a professional virtual assistance and business support service dedicated to helping entrepreneurs, small businesses, and busy professionals streamline their operations. We specialize in administrative support, customer service, social media management, recruitment assistance with onboarding, and business/company branding. Our mission is to help clients save time, enhance productivity, and build strong, recognizable brands while they focus on growing their businesses.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

1.) Digital Marketing Manager

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Part-time (Hybrid)

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The Digital Marketing Manager is responsible for developing and implementing the organization’s digital marketing strategies including marketing campaigns that increases brand awareness, drives traffic, acquires leads tailored to meet set sales and marketing goals.


Key Responsibilities


	Curate marketing and sales strategies
	Work with CEO to execute marketing strategies
	Plan, create and post engaging content for Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, YouTube, TikTok, Pinterest, Google my business, etc. ensuring brand image and message is consistent across all digital channels
	Generate, edit, publish and share engaging content daily
	Engage with followers, respond to comments and DMs, respond to queries in timely manner, monitor customer reviews and build community
	Create high converting captions and sales copy that drives engagement and sales
	Run paid adverts (Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, Google, etc.) to drive traffic and sales and measure ROI on campaigns
	Conduct social media audits and monitor sales and marketing KPIs to track success
	Generate quality leads by preparing quality lead magnet
	Develop, deploy and manage email marketing campaigns and WhatsApp broadcasts
	Develop and deploy launch campaigns for new products and services
	Upload and update product images, product descriptions, prices, etc on the company website to ensure accuracy and consistency
	Ensure the online store is optimized for user experience and sales
	Monitor website performance, website traffic, sales and campaign performance using analytics tools, report issues and coordinate with developer for timely fixes.
	Create SEO blog posts
	Stay updated on current trends, audience preference, competitor activities, customer buying behavior, etc.
	Stay up to date with latest social media best practices and technologies
	Secure partnerships and collaborative deals with influencers, communities, industry professionals and complementary brands
	Establish, develop and maintain positive business and customer relationships
	Prepare periodic reports and suggest improvements for better results.


Qualifications and Requirements


	Minimum of an OND in Marketing or related discipline
	Proven work experience in a Digital Marketing role (minimum of 2 years).


Skills and Qualities:


	Expertise in Facebook/instagram/Google/Tiktok Ads, creating content and managing communities
	Excellent copy writing skills
	Intellectual curiosity and an interest in learning new skills
	Ability to deliver creative content (Text, image, video)
	Expert knowledge of SEO and keyword research
	Social media and tech savvy and up to date on current trends
	Knowledge of digital marketing strategies, online marketing channels and an ability to deliver on metrics-driven results
	Familiar with web design
	Excellent English writing and communication skills
	Problem solving skills
	Analytical, multitasking and time management skills
	Excellent graphic design and video editing skills.
	Lagos would be the primary job location, Might be required to travel, work overtime and on weekends.


Personal Attributes:


	Sociable and friendly
	Confident and pleasant
	Assertive and creative
	Keen eye for detail.


Salary
N150,000 monthly.

Application Closing Date: 17th October, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CVs to: avsabujacareer@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

 

2.) Executive Assistant & Content Creator 

Job Location: Wuse Zone 4, Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time

Role Overview


	You’ll serve as the right-hand to management, supporting day-to-day operations while creating engaging social media content that reflects our brand’s beauty and lifestyle focus.


Key Responsibilities


	Manage daily office operations and schedules
	Handle correspondence, emails, and client inquiries
	Maintain organized records, files, and inventory tracking
	Assist in coordinating vendor and supplier relations
	Prepare reports, meeting notes, and follow-ups
	Support store management and ensure smooth workflow
	Create and edit engaging photo and video content for Instagram, TikTok & other platforms
	Brainstorm creative campaigns, product showcases, and beauty tutorials
	Manage content calendars and posting schedules
	Collaborate with the team for product launches, events, and brand promotions
	Monitor trends and analytics to boost engagement and brand growth


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess an HND qualification
	Female applicant preferred
	Highly organized, proactive, and detail-oriented
	Excellent communication and multitasking skills
	Passion for beauty, fashion, and content creation
	Basic experience in admin, executive support, or office management
	Must be based in Abuja (or able to commute to Wuse Zone 4 daily)


Salary
N100,000 - N120,000 monthly.

Application Closing Date: 16th October, 2025.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CVs and Portfolios to: avsabujacareer@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

IP NOC Engineer Job at Equinix




        
    

        
        Equinix is the world’s digital infrastructure company®, operating over 260 data centers across the globe. Digital leaders harness Equinix's trusted platform to bring together and interconnect foundational infrastructure at software speed. Equinix enables organizations to access all the right places, partners and possibilities to scale with agility, speed the launch of digital services, deliver world-class experiences and multiply their value, while supporting their sustainability goals.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: IP NOC Engineer

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The IP NOC engineer will be responsible for proactive monitoring of Transmission and IP services and devices across the Equinix network through the support of Network monitoring systems, perform first-line troubleshooting/fault isolation, resolve where necessary and escalate to other levels for support in line with Equinix internal processes


Responsibilities


	Monitor Equinix network, providing a specific update, status, and performance of all network components, capacity services, etc.
	Identify and provide at least first-line support on all faults on the Equinix network in accordance with the Company’s standard operating procedure for fault escalation and management
	Maintain and ensure full compliance with all Equinix NOC processes and procedures
	Ensure proper technical documentation of all network events throughout normal/shift cycles or operations
	Answer all network support-related telephone calls and interface with internal/external customers on operational issues and related network events, using Equinix standard operating procedures
	Run daily and weekly management reports on network events and activities, as well as tracking escalations and other key performance indicators and ensure all customer SLAs are met


Qualifications


	B.Sc / HND in Electrical / Electronic Engineering or related discipline
	Proven years of experience in the configuration, operations and maintenance of Network devices (Cisco, Juniper, FortiGate etc.), optical fiber SDH and wireless network equipment
	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
	Strong Knowledge of Synchronous Digital Hierarchy technology
	Strong Knowledge of DWDM/OTN technology  
	Strong knowledge of PtP/PtMP Microwave technologies
	Knowledge of basic TCP/IP configurations and troubleshooting
	Excellent and effective communication skills, both orally and in writing
	Working knowledge of IP devices
	Working knowledge of Ubiquiti or Ceragon radio.


Demands of the Job:


	Will be ready to work on 24 X 7 base depending on the shift roster, to man the network surveillance tools. 
	Also, should be ready to travel to support other Equinix Operations in Africa and beyond.

Oilserv Limited was incorporated in 1992 and commenced operations in 1995.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Audit Coordinator

Job Location: Rivers
Job type: Full-time

Job Summary

	This position will be responsible for executing a risk-based audit plan to assess, report on, and make suggestions for improving the company’s key operational and finance activities and internal controls.
	Additionally, work with limited supervision primarily as leader of a team (normally 1 - 3 analysts) responsible for accomplishing all aspects of assigned reviews.


Job Details


	Support the internal audit function in conducting audits, including planning, testing, and reporting.
	Collaborate with departmental managers to understand their operations and identify areas of risk.
	Assist in the development of audit plans and strategies that align with business objectives and regulatory requirements.
	Identify and analyse risks and make recommendations for improvement.
	Monitor and follow-up on the implementation of audit recommendations and ensure corrective actions are taken.
	Prepare reports for management on audit findings and recommendations.
	Review and update internal policies and procedures to ensure compliance with regulatory requirements.
	Maintain a strong understanding of regulatory requirements and changes that may impact the organization. 
	Supervise audit team to ensure quality and on-time delivery.
	Evaluate current audit procedures and recommend improvements.
	Evaluate and enhance internal controls to improve operational efficiency.
	Discuss with management about audit observations, recommendations, and actions to be taken.
	Prepare clear and complete audit work papers and store them in department repository.

	Train/mentor staff assigned to the team. Prepare performance reviews at completion of reviews.
	Ensure that all work papers supporting the review are clear and concise.


Requirements


	A minimum of a bachelor’s degree from a recognized university. 
	A minimum of 7 years of experience in the Enterprise Risk Management field in similar organisations.
	Recognized professional in Accounting, Risk Management, and Internal Audit with ACA, ACCA, or CIA certification. 
	Relevant management qualification or training.


Benefits


	Great work culture and multiple opportunities for growth and self-development. 
	18 days of annual leave, excluding federal public holidays. 
	Health insurance coverage. 
	Monthly employer pension contribution.
